{"step_by_step_thinking": "Airway obstruction refers to a decreased ability to move air, which can be partial or complete. According to Document [1], signs of a partially obstructed airway include a changed voice, noisy breathing, and an increased breathing effort. Document [2] also mentions noisy breathing as a vital clinical sign of airway obstruction.
